name: Freefall Racers
description: Come fly with us  and discover a world ruled by flying squirrels with an unquenchable desire for skydiving in Freefall Racers! Pick your favourite squirrel from a host of unique characters and explore 8 exciting jungle, winter and dessert inspired routes. Use the Kinect Sensor to fly your friends nuts as you'll turn any race in your favour by using power-ups and bonus-items found on your way down. These nutty antics will be enjoyed over and over again. For 1-2 players.
